review: Excellent service at Smiles Forever clinic.Dr. Aditi Lele is amazing! Dr.Suhas Lele is so experienced and has such a positive energy! The staff is very polite and professional at the same time.I highly recommend this clinic for Dental work and procedures.Kudos to Dr.Lele and his team.
Doctor is very friendly, soft spoken & caring... making me very comfortable throughout the session.
